testcase.system-out: 03:23:52.691 [main] INFO dev.mgmeral.ticket.service.impl.PurchaseServiceImpl -- order.create.start idemKey=idem-dup2 paymentRef=p-ref holdId=10 03:23:52.692 [main] WARN dev.mgmeral.ticket.service.impl.PurchaseServiceImpl -- order.duplicatePaymentRef idemKey=idem-dup2 paymentRef=p-ref existingOrderId=2
